static makePercentage (   $num_amount,
  $num_total 
)
static

takes two numbers - one large (the total) and one small (the percentage) and returns the amount representing that percentage. In other words: Given 20% of '5', would return '1'.

Parameters
$num_amount
$num_total
Returns

static roundTo (   $number,
  $to 
)
static

This function will let you round to an arbitrary non-zero number. Zero of course causes a division by zero.

Parameters
float $number the number being rounded
int $to the number to round to
Returns
